name: Network-Verification-Bot
description: a verification bot to verify user in your network

API_HASH.description: Your API_HASH, Get it from https://my.telegram.org/

API_ID.description: Your API_ID, Get it from https://my.telegram.org/

ADMINS.description: list of Auth user Id who can access bot without password and have rights to use admin commands

TOS_LINK.description: A default caption to be added to the file at bottom

VERIFICATION_CHANNEL_ID.description: A telegram channel username without @ to force users to join channel before using bot.

VERIFICATION_CHANNEL_USERNAME.description: Your Telegram user id, Get this from @FileStore_Nsbot.

ENV.description: Set it to anything to enable configuration by environment variables.

NETWORK_NAME.description: Set the timegap in sec to reduce FloodWait. If you don't want to add leave empty.

HQ_USERNAME.description: A telegram channel or group id to know who are using bot

NETWORK_USERNAME.description: Set the timegap in sec to reduce FloodWait. If you don't want to add leave empty.

NETWORK_IMG.description: Set the timegap in sec to reduce FloodWait. If you don't want to add leave empty.

HQ_ID.description: Set the timegap in sec to reduce FloodWait. If you don't want to add leave empty.
